description: open sides with three pairs of ties with very large, heavy black, blue and silver tassels on each side; slit V-neckline; heavy overall embroidery in black, dark blue, light blue, green, gold, silver, blue, fuchsia, green and copper metallics in bird and flower motifs; knotted bottom fringe
dimension: 29 3/4 x 25 1/8 in. (75.57 x 63.82 cm) (without tassles, including fringe)
medium: Synthetic fibers, cotton(?), metallic threads; needlework
title: Man's tunic
